name: Block Kicker 3D
description:
WHAT IS THIS?

Control a marble and kick blocks. This takes place on floating terraces and involves a tiny challenge with light up panels. It’s a lonely existence with little to do, but physics simulations are fun to knock around for a bit.

WHY IS THIS?

Originally created this July 4th, 2014 as a break from another prototype. Before I made this prototype, I created a similar concept as a Blender game (yep) and it had more to see and do, so maybe I’ll find a nice way to provide that experience, as well, eventually. Watch this space.

HOW TO ...THIS?

Use WASD/Arrows to move and ESC to exit to desktop.
